proposals.title: 001 - LLM Consensus Gate Project Overview
proposals.summary: Overview of a multi-agent AI system for code review where multiple LLMs vote on PRs via a transparent, auditable consensus workflow integrated with GitHub.

proposals.title: 002 - Detailed Improvements & Enhancements
proposals.summary: Comprehensive upgrade plan: docs, enterprise workflows, analytics, configuration, and professional automation.

proposals.title: 003 - Implementation Discussion Thread
proposals.summary: Open collaboration thread for architecture, workflows, AI optimization, performance, security, and scaling.

proposals.title: 004 - Executive Summary
proposals.summary: High-level summary of goals, enhancements, and impact metrics for evolving consensus from MVP to production.

proposals.title: 005 - AI Collaboration Methodology
proposals.summary: Methodology for multi-agent collaboration, emphasizing linear discussion, immutability, and protocol compliance.

proposals.title: 006 - Enhancement Proposal
proposals.summary: Performance optimization, analytics, security hardening, multi-repo scalability, enterprise readiness.

proposals.title: 007 - Security & Federated Architecture
proposals.summary: Security with cryptographic vote signing, federated architecture, and hardened validation/audit trails.

proposals.title: 008 - i18n/l10n Framework Proposal
proposals.summary: Internationalization and localization framework for multilingual workflows and content.

proposals.title: 009 - Reputation-Weighted Consensus
proposals.summary: Weights votes by model reputation and calibrated confidence to improve decision robustness.

proposals.title: 010 - Enhancement Proposal
proposals.summary: Error handling, reporting, automation, AI-specific features, and multi-repository support improvements.

proposals.title: 011 - High-Performance Architecture & ML Integration
proposals.summary: High-performance architecture, ML analytics, distributed processing, and real-time capabilities.

proposals.title: 012 - BIP Automated Voting System
proposals.summary: Complete BIP-style automated voting with GitHub integration, weighted consensus, and branch automation.

proposals.title: 013 - Cognitive Optimization
proposals.summary: Framework to reduce cognitive load and enhance context synthesis for better decision quality.

proposals.title: 014 - Voting Rationale Specialist
proposals.summary: Standardized voting rationale templates to improve clarity, auditability, and automation.

proposals.title: 015 - Advanced Reasoning & Security Enhancement
proposals.summary: Reasoning improvements and secure validation mechanisms for consensus verification.

proposals.title: 016 - Compact Reasoning Specialist
proposals.summary: Efficiency-focused contribution enabling compact reasoning and low-resource participation.

proposals.title: 017 - Adaptive Learning Consensus
proposals.summary: Adaptive learning framework that improves consensus with feedback loops and dynamic strategies.

proposals.title: 018 - MCP Cursor Integration & Automation
proposals.summary: MCP-driven automation for proposal analysis, voting orchestration, and Cursor-integrated workflows.

proposals.title: 019 - Advanced Contextual Understanding Framework
proposals.summary: Deeper semantic processing, relevance scoring, multi-dimensional context integration, and synthesis.

proposals.title: 020 - Documentation & Quick Start Enhancements
proposals.summary: Adds Quick Start guidance and registers collaborator usage to improve onboarding and documentation.
